summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cluster X landing page. Frontend displays correctly with all required sections, but backend demo call API has configuration issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 error instead of expected 503 for unconfigured service
critical_bugs.impact: Demo call functionality not working properly

configuration_issues.issue: DEMO_AGENT_ID and DEMO_BOLNA_API_KEY are placeholder values
configuration_issues.symptoms: API calls fail with generic 500 error
configuration_issues.expected_behavior: Should return 503 with 'service not configured' message

passed_tests: Landing page renders at root URL for unauthenticated users
Hero section with phone input and country code selector displays correctly
Stats section shows 10,000+ Concurrent Calls, 99.9% Uptime, 20+ Languages
Industries section displays all 6 industries (BFSI, Healthcare, Logistics, Education, E-commerce, HR & Recruitment)
Login and Get Started buttons navigate to /login page
Phone input validation works - rejects invalid phone numbers
Phone input validation works - rejects missing phone numbers
Demo call API endpoint accepts valid phone numbers (returns error due to config)
Orange brand color theme applied correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure proper demo Bolna API credentials (DEMO_AGENT_ID, DEMO_BOLNA_API_KEY) in .env file, or update error handling to return 503 status with proper error message for unconfigured service
